DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study validate SpO2 accuracy pulse oximeter equipment comparison `` gold-standard '' measurement blood SaO2 CO-oximeter
DOC.criteria: Subjects participate study voluntary basis All subject good health time study . Unless specify otherwise protocol , follow value could apply : COHb < 3 % , MetHb < 2 % , ctHb > 10 g/dl ; Inclusion criterion serve purpose study Smokers individual expose high level carbon monoxide result elevate carboxyhaemoglobin level , unless specific dyshaemoglobins call study protocol . Individuals subject condition result elevate level methaemoglobin , unless specific dyshaemoglobins call study protocol . Subjects would place undue medical risk associate procedure call protocol ( e.g . arterial cannulation hypoxia ) . Age : young person 50 year old .
